house_listing.house_description: This detached single family home built in 1956 has 4 bedroom(s), 4.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 5231 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Prudential California Realty Prudential California Realty
